evidence.claim: Convr leverages AWS for scalable cloud computing solutions.
The company implements HIPAA compliance for health data security.
Convr utilizes HL7 standards to facilitate electronic health information exchange.
Integration via RESTful APIs for seamless connection with existing systems.
Convr supports X12 EDI transactions for insurance claim processing.

icp.icp_reason: Convr is focused on healthcare data exchange with a strong API and EDI focus.
